member.summary: Extendable file based resource manager.

member.summary: Path to retrieve the files from.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.FileFormat
member.summary: Format of the resource set po file based on {{culture}} and {{resource}} placeholders.

member.name: T:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for events related to the creation, successful or not, of a resource set.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Exception in case of error, null on success.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs.FileName
member.summary: FileName from where the resource set was loaded.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs.ResourceSetType
member.summary: Type of the resource set being initialized.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs.ResourceSet
member.summary: Instance of the resource set created, may be null on error.

member.name: P:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.ResourceSetCreationEventArgs.Success
member.summary: Whether the creation was successful.

member.name: E:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.CreatedResourceSet
member.summary: Event that notifies the successful creation of a resource set.

member.name: E:PHP.Library.GetText.GetTextSharp.FileBasedResourceManager.FailedResourceSet
member.summary: Event that notifies an error creating a resource set.

member.summary: Creates a new instance.
member.param: Path to retrieve the files from

member.summary: Specify the character encoding in which the messages from the DOMAIN message catalog will be returned.

member.summary: Plural version of dcgettext.

member.summary: Override the current domain for a single message lookup.

member.summary: Plural version of dgettext.

member.summary: Plural version of gettext

member.name: M:PHP.Library.GetText.PhpGetText.textdomain(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This function sets the domain to search within when calls are made to gettext(), usually the named after an application.
